slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/smart-accounts/classes/SelectorNotAllowed/constructor
---

Constructor for initializing an error message indicating that the selector being added is not allowed.

<Note>
  `SelectorNotAllowed` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs for
  PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { SelectorNotAllowed } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### functionName

`string`
The function name of the selector that is being added.
